headline: Introducing Smart Edge Revalidation
keywords: Impact Week, Cache, Product News, Edge, Developer Platform, Agile Developer Services
description: When both Last-Modified and Etag headers are absent from the origin response, Smart Edge Revalidation will use the time the object was cached on Cloudflare as the Last-Modified header value. When Cloudflare receives a revalidation request, our edge can respond using the generated header.
